Hi! I'm Marco Valente and I'm a web application developer!

Web technology has always fascinated me! I find pleasure in conceptualising and building functional web applications that serve purpose.

Global Experience

With eight years of practical commercial experience, I've had fantastic opportunities to work with companies and clients from across Europe and Africa. As a result I've had the great pleasure of developing web applications of many shapes and sizes.

Best Practices

I strive to develop web solutions with a keen adherence to quality and standards. I am a firm believer of best practices, which I feel is the cornerstone of any beautifully built application.

Contact me

Focus

My focus is predominantly on bespoke, backend oriented applications. Some examples include:

  • Back end RESTful APIs.
  • Interactive online applications.
  • E-commerce portals.
  • Bespoke CRM solutions.
